titleStmt.title: The effect of certaine branches of the statute made in anno 33. Henrici VIIJ, touching the maintenance of artillery, and the punishment of such as vse vnlavvfull games very necessary to be put in execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill ...,

notesStmt.note: Classified by STC as a proclamation of Charles I.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
